body:
I assume you are running this on the iOS simulator? Turn off the host machine's hardware keyboard integration by unchecking Hardware > Keyboard > Connect hardware keyboard (Shift+Cmd+K), and the keyboard will appear when you focus on a TextInput.

You can also manually toggle the software keyboard visibility with Cmd+K.

On a real device the keyboard should work out-of-the-box as expected.
title: Input text doesn't show keyboard on iOS simulator
